stories.text:
I'm building getassigned.com. It will be a platform that allows you to assign anything to anyone without complicated onboarding.

Obviously this is too broad of a concept, so I'm wondering, what are the best ways to discover new customer verticals the product can fit in to?

Little background: This project actually began as a solution a fairly specific problem of being able to assign leads to other people outside the organization. Since then, I've generalized the nomenclature and allowed for custom fields so that a company could assign anything (leads, tasks, questions, etc.) Since doing so, I've gotten a ton of positive feedback about how this platform could fit into different industries. However I've I only want to focus on one. Figured I would reach out and ask if anyone has been in this situation or has any advice.
stories.title: How to Choose a Customer Vertical?
